DOC.brief_summary: This Phase 2 clinical trial adult hypogonadal male baseline morning serum testosterone concentration < 300 ng/dL . The purpose study evaluate pharmacokinetics FE 999303 , deliver use applicator comparison hand application
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Evaluate Pharmacokinetics Testosterone Gel Using Applicator
DOC.criteria: Ages 1875 History hypogonadism In good health base medical history , physical examination , clinical laboratory test Serum testosterone deficiency One symptom ( ) testosterone deficiency ( i.e . fatigue , reduce libido , reduce sexual functioning ) Body mass index ( BMI ) 18 35 kg/m^2 All screening lab test within 20 % normal range ( exception liver function test ) HIV , Hepatitis B C negative Previous use FE 999303 Prostate cancer Breast carcinoma , patient partner Palpable prostatic mass ( e ) Serum PSA level â‰¥3 ng/dL Chronic use drug abuse Lower urinary tract obstruction Clinically significant anemia renal dysfunction Cardiovascular disease Hyperparathyroidism uncontrolled diabetes Generalized skin irritation significant skin disease Use medication could consider anabolic ( e.g . dehydroepiandrosterone ( DHEA ) ) could interfere androgen metabolism ( e.g . spironolactone , 5alfareductaseinhibitors , ketoconazole , abiraterone ) Use estrogens , GnRH agonists/antagonist , antiandrogens , human GH ( within previous 12 month screen ) Use testosterone product ( within 8 week screen parenteral product , 6 week screen preparation ) Sleep apnea Untreated depression Subject partner pregnant use contraception
